website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced official American Girl doll product for crafty kids with supplies that are age appropriate.
pros: Has the supplies to create bracelets and necklaces
Instructions are easy for kids to follow
Everything is included in the kit including a crochet tool
cons: Like any craft kit, this one can be messy

customer_reviews.title: ... as she loves AG and crafting and she absolutely loved it! Will have so much fun creating pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little cousin for Christmas as she loves AG and crafting and she absolutely loved it! Will have so much fun creating pieces together. Great price and fast ship. Makes an excellent gift for a crafty little girl. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Genuine AG Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and they absolutely loved it!!!......and I loved how it was almost half the price as in the American Girl store! This is a genuine AG product and gives them hours and hours of crafting fun!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Large kit, Large Variety
customer_reviews.text: This bead kit had a lot more in it than I expected for the price and I am very pleased. My niece is nine and growing a little too old for stuffed animals but she loves arts and crafts. This kit looks like I could have spent twenty-five dollars rather than the fifteen I actually spent on it. It has a wide color variety with the beads.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great crafting kit for doll lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little pieces in this kit can be lost, but with the right supervision, and for the right child, this is a great gift! Our nieces all love to craft, and love their dolls, so this was the perfect gift. When our niece opened this gift up, she was immediately planning to have craft time with me to make matching bracelets for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott1282

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, my little cousin is going to love ...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, my little cousin is going to love playing this this and creating things and she is 8. I really wouldn't recommend it for anyone younger than that as it looks like it could be difficult for smaller children and many small parts!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fun but instructions are hard to follow
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old goddaughter had a lot of fun with the pieces, but she and her friends found the instructions to hard to follow, and just wounded up doing it their own way.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: Looked cute but not well received
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for a 10 year old. She never opened it and tried to give it away to another friend. That friend didn’t want it... so not sure if it’s just too young for 10 year olds or doesn’t seem fun
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 8 year old. Kept us entertained for hours
customer_reviews.author: JANICE THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Fun craft set for girls
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for our 11 year old granddaughter. She loved it and has been using it often to make jewelry for her doll herself and her mom. There is a lot of stuff in this box to make a wide range of jewelry and perfect for her age
customer_reviews.author: Kat Little (Queen Kitty)

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly seems overpriced for what is included, simply because it is American Girl brand yet nothing inside the box was 'branded.' You would be better off going to a craft store.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Not For An 8 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: No way can a child do this craft. It requires adult supervision and substantial assistance. We are still vacuuming up the little beads.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Received as a christmas present. Really nice and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B. Urszinyi

customer_reviews.title: Used for a friend's daughters birthday gift and she loved it worked it camE it was something different at ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for a friend's daughters birthday gift and she loved it worked it camE it was something different at affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura VerDuin

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! They have so many crafts you can do. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: ElaineS

customer_reviews.title: Younger children may have some trouble but can still get excited to make the projects.
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loved this kit. The older niece had no problem with using the kit and jumped right into it. My younger niece had more trouble and needed assistance with making her bracelet. Even so she loved using it and looks forward to doing making more projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived damaged! I'm having great difficulty trying to get an email to ask for a replacement! I'm not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my oldest granddaughter (7) for Christmas. She loves to craft and made bracelets for every one Christmas Day.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Best review you can get
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas. She saw it and hugged it. Best review you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hart

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: It was a good item overall ,lots of things that you culls make. But when I got it, the package looked like someone had dropped it a couple times. The packaging was ripped and bent. I had got this for my sister's daughter and I felt bad giving her a craft kit that looked like I found it in a box of old toys. But overall she likes to make bracelets for her and her American Girl Doll.
customer_reviews.author: Aids

customer_reviews.title: Good price for an authentic American Girl product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for an authentic American Girl product. This is a Christmas gift for my 8 year old granddaughter and I'm sure she will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: American Girl Products for the American Girl
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of the American Girl Crafts, Books, Dolls etc...and my Grandaughter who is Eight now really enjoys them. She spends a lot of time with them and really learns a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for new American girl owner

customer_reviews.title: Rip off, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy that within days of receipt this went from a $15 item to a $6 item. Have to decide if it is worth returning when they rip you on return shipping.

customer_reviews.title: This craft is awesome AND ITS AMERICAN GIRL DOLL
customer_reviews.text: This craft is awesome AND ITS AMERICAN GIRL DOLL! My girls flipped over it and we spent some quality time together playing with it.

product_meta.title: Fashion Angels American Girl 24109 Ultimate Crafting Kit
product_meta.description: Be the ultimate crafter with the American Girl ultimate crafting kit by fashion Angels! this kit has all essentials items to create and design jewelry and other craft projects for you and your doll! includes mini bottles, large bottle, spools, twine, elastic cord, embroidery floss, mini clothespins, round beads, iridescent donut beads, wooden beads, pearls, cube beads, buttons, mini start beads, cylinder beads, earring hooks, jump rings and design guide and instructional design guide. Recommended ages 8+.
feature_bullets: Design and create jewelry and crafts for you and your doll
Inspirational design guide full of fun crafting ideas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
